examples.text: Can I ask another question pls?

intents.description: Want to ask a question or have an issue

examples.text: What are differences in your SC analytics plans?
What subscription plans do you have for your offering?
Need info on your supply chain reporting options.
what extra features does premium have?

values.text: Okay! An agent will not call you back.
Your contact details have been shared with the agent. The agent will call you back soon.

values: Would you like to see a recorded demo now or schedule a live demo?

values.text: OK, an agent will NOT contact you.

values: Sure! Please help us with the below information.

values.text: Thank you for allowing me to serve you. I will now connect you with one of our agents. Please standby.
I am now initiating a transfer to a live agent. Someone should be with you momentarily.
Thank you for letting me serve you. I will remain on standby for your next inquiry.
OK, no problem.
I'm sorry I cannot help you with that request.

values: Demos cannot be scheduled on Saturday or Sunday. Please choose a different day.
When would you like to see a demo?
You cannot schedule a demo for a day in the past. Please choose a different date.

values.text: Please describe your issue, preferably in a single sentence.
Please tell me your question and I'll do my best to get you an immediate answer.

generic.title: An agent is currently not available. Do you want an agent to call you back?

values.text: Some fantastic pre-recorded demonstrations of all key features can be found on our demos site at $demos_site.

values: Which plan's features would you like the demo to cover? Standard, Plus or Premium? (Note: Your current plan is $my_plan.)

values.text: I'm sorry, I don't have access to the Software Environment Knowledge Base at this time. However, you can find that information on our $software_env_site.

Our flagship Supply Chain Analytics (SCA) offering is an industry leading cloud-native solution for mid-market and large enterprise entities. For detail on SCA as well as additional offerings, please see our $product_info_site.

dialog_nodes.title: Data Modeling How To - Search Skill

values.text: We have several subscription plans available to suit your needs. You are currently on the $my_plan plan. For a comparison of plan features, see our $product_plans_site.
Welcome to ACME Software. We provide supply chain management solutions for the retail and consumer products industries. What can I do for you?

You can contact us by email ($support_email) and, of course, through me 24-7. Live agents are available to assist Monday through Friday 8am - 8pm EST. If you would like to speak to a live agent, please respond with "Talk to an agent".

values: Demos must be scheduled between 8am and 5pm Eastern Time. Please choose another time.

values.text: A horse walks into a bar. The bartender says, why the long face?
Why did the pig stop sunbathing? He was bacon in the heat.
Why did the pig stop sunbathing? He was bacon in the heat.
My dog has a lot of potential, you just have to unleash it.
The leopard was so good at guessing. Every time he was spot on.
The Rodent Club finished drafting their constitution, but it has yet to be ratified.
Do birds know where they're going when they fly south for the winter or do they just wing it every time?
I wanted to bring a penguin home but my parents said that wasn't going to fly.
The tarantula found his partner online. He spider on the web.
The historian loves reading about bobcats. They are lynx to the past.
I'd tell you a joke about a cow but I always butcher it.
I used to have a pet leech. It was attached to me.
I wondered why the baseball was getting bigger. Then it hit me.
I'm reading a book about anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down.
I'd tell you a chemistry joke but I know I wouldn't get a reaction.
I used to be a banker but I lost interest.
I wasn't originally going to get a brain transplant, but then I changed my mind.
Did you hear about the guy who got hit in the head with a can of soda? He was lucky it was a soft drink.
The experienced carpenter really nailed it, but the new guy screwed everything up.
Have you ever tried to eat a clock? It's very time consuming.
A bicycle can't stand on its own because it is two-tired.
Need an ark to save two of every animal? I Noah guy.
I couldn't quite remember how to throw a boomerang, but eventually it came back to me.
The roundest knight at king Arthur's round table was Sir Cumference.
I don't trust these stairs because they're always up to something.
A friend of mine tried to annoy me with bird puns, but I soon realized that toucan play at that game.
I'm sorry, I'll try to do better.
I'll try harder to better assist you.
I'm sorry you feel that way.
I'm glad!
Ok, no problem, I'll stand by. Just respond when you are ready.
I apologize for my lack of clarity. If you would like to speak with an agent, please respond with "Agent", otherwise let's continue.
So sorry.
Hi! I'm looking forward to assisting you. What can I help you with?
We employ the latest cryptographic technologies to protect your data while at rest and in motion.
I am a multilingual virtual assistant available 24-7 to address your questions about our SCA solution. Just ask me any question and I'll do my best to answer it.
No demo will be scheduled at this time.

values: I will be happy to submit a request to schedule a live demo. First, however, I will need some information. When would you like to see a live demo?

values.text: Great, I will submit a request for a live demo to be given on $demo_date at $demo_time covering key features for the $demo_plan plan.

values: OK, abandoning your request for a live demo.

values.text: Please elaborate a bit more on your question or issue.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
Can I help you with anything else today?
What else can I do for you?
Sorry, I didn't understand. Could you try rephrasing?  Or, to talk to an agent, respond with "Talk to an Agent".
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding. Or, to talk to an agent, respond with "Talk to an Agent".
I didn't quite catch that. Could you phrase in another way? Or, to talk to an agent, respond with "Talk to an Agent".
Hi, I'm your virtual assistant here to help 24-7. How can I help you?
For that I will need to connect you to a live agent. Is that OK?
